name: Dragons and Owls and Bears, Oh My!
name_original: Dragons and Owls and Bears, Oh My!
description:
A local recluse has put out the most curious of jobs on the message board - monster hunters wanted to either kill or capture an escaped specimen out near the previously abandoned wizards tower. What will your party discover in the tower and will the fact be of this escaped specimen? 

Dragons and Owls and Bears, Oh My! is a Fifth Edition adventure designed for four to six characters of 6th to 10th level and is optimized for four characters with an average party level (APL) of 9. 

This adventure contains 2 new creatures, 4 custom battlemaps, 3 new magic items and 2 musical tracks to bring your session to life!

For our complete backlog of 5e adventures and thematic music tracks for each of our releases, join us on Patreon!
